root.name: Legend of the River King
root.description: OverviewLegend of the River King is a unique RPG that includes basic leveling elements as well as a integral fishing component. This first addition to the franchise also included some basic combat elements. The gameplay mostly consisted of fishing, but there were some random battles. Mostly your character was doing quests where people need certain fish caught for meals, etc in order to advance the story to the next stage. You could always return to previous fishing areas so that you could catch fish from those regions when you needed them.StoryThe story features you playing as a young boy who's little sister falls into a coma. There is a cure to bring her out of the strange coma, but that cure lies with the Ultimate fishing challenge. Capturing the Legendary River KIng! The River King itself is a mystical fish that only exists in a specific hidden location that you will spend your time adventuring to find.
